application_credentials.description:
Follow the [instructions]({more_info_url}) to configure the Cloud Console:

1. Go to the [OAuth consent screen]({oauth_consent_url}) and configure
1. Go to [Credentials]({oauth_creds_url}) and select **Create Credentials**.
1. From the drop-down list select **OAuth client ID**.
1. Select **Web Application** for the Application Type.
1. Add `{redirect_url}` under *Authorized redirect URI*.

create_cloud_project.title: Nest: Create and configure Cloud Project
create_cloud_project.description:
The Nest integration allows you to integrate your Nest Thermostats, Cameras, and Doorbells using the Smart Device Management API. The SDM API **requires a US $5** one time setup fee. See documentation for [more info]({more_info_url}).

1. Go to the [Google Cloud Console]({cloud_console_url}).
1. If this is your first project, select **Create Project** then **New Project**.
1. Give your Cloud Project a Name and then select **Create**.
1. Save the Cloud Project ID e.g. *example-project-12345* as you will need it later
1. Go to API Library for [Smart Device Management API]({sdm_api_url}) and select **Enable**.
1. Go to API Library for [Cloud Pub/Sub API]({pubsub_api_url}) and select **Enable**.

Proceed when your cloud project is set up.

cloud_project.title: Nest: Enter Cloud Project ID
cloud_project.description: Enter the Cloud Project ID below e.g. *example-project-12345*. See the [Google Cloud Console]({cloud_console_url}) or the documentation for [more info]({more_info_url}).

device_project.title: Nest: Create a Device Access Project
device_project.description:
Create a Nest Device Access project which **requires paying Google a US $5 fee** to set up.
1. Go to the [Device Access Console]({device_access_console_url}), and through the payment flow.
1. Select on **Create project**
1. Give your Device Access project a name and select **Next**.
1. Enter your OAuth Client ID
1. Skip enabling events for now and select **Create project**.

Enter your Device Access Project ID below ([more info]({more_info_url})).

pubsub_topic.title: Configure Cloud Pub/Sub topic
pubsub_topic.description: Nest devices publish updates on a Cloud Pub/Sub topic. You can select an existing topic if one exists, or choose to create a new topic and the next step will create it for you with the necessary permissions. See the integration documentation for [more info]({more_info_url}).

pubsub_topic_confirm.title: Enable events
pubsub_topic_confirm.description:
The Nest Device Access Console needs to be configured to publish device events to your Pub/Sub topic.

1. Visit the [Device Access Console]({device_access_console_url}).
2. Open the project.
3. Enable *Events* and set the Pub/Sub topic name to `{topic_name}`
4. Click *Add & Validate* to verify the topic is configured correctly.

See the integration documentation for [more info]({more_info_url}).

pubsub_subscription.title: Configure Cloud Pub/Sub subscription
pubsub_subscription.description:
Home Assistant receives realtime Nest device updates with a Cloud Pub/Sub subscription for topic `{topic}`.

Select an existing subscription below if one already exists, or the next step will create a new one for you. See the integration documentation for [more info]({more_info_url}).

reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: The Nest integration needs to re-authenticate your account

error.bad_project_id: Please enter a valid Cloud Project ID (check Cloud Console)
error.wrong_project_id: Please enter a valid Cloud Project ID (was same as Device Access Project ID)
error.no_pubsub_topics: No eligible Pub/Sub topics found, please ensure Device Access Console has a Pub/Sub topic.
error.pubsub_api_error: Unknown error talking to Cloud Pub/Sub, see logs
